00099 #define HAS_SKILL_TRAIT( s, t ) (s->ubSkillTrait1 == t || s->ubSkillTrait2 == t)
00100 #define NUM_SKILL_TRAITS( s, t ) ( (s->ubSkillTrait1 == t) ? ( (s->ubSkillTrait2 == t) ? 2 : 1 ) : ( (s->ubSkillTrait2 == t) ? 1 : 0 ) )

00291 #define SOLDIER_CLASS_ENEMY( bSoldierClass )          ( ( bSoldierClass >= SOLDIER_CLASS_ADMINISTRATOR ) && ( bSoldierClass <= SOLDIER_CLASS_ARMY ) )
00292 #define SOLDIER_CLASS_MILITIA( bSoldierClass )  ( ( bSoldierClass >= SOLDIER_CLASS_GREEN_MILITIA ) && ( bSoldierClass <= SOLDIER_CLASS_ELITE_MILITIA ) )

00294 // This macro should be used whenever we want to see if someone is neutral
00295 // IF WE ARE CONSIDERING ATTACKING THEM.  Creatures & bloodcats will attack neutrals
00296 // but they can't attack empty vehicles!!
00297 #define CONSIDERED_NEUTRAL( me, them ) ( (them->bNeutral) && ( me->bTeam != CREATURE_TEAM || (them->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE) ) )
